summary: Management assigned custodial duties to non-maintenance employees during custodiansâ€™ leave.
rewritten_summary: Custodial tasks were improperly assigned to clerks and mail handlers while regular custodians were on leave. The union was not informed, and no effort was made to find qualified custodians.

violations.violation_reason: Management failed to notify the union about changes in work assignments.
Custodial work covered under MS-47 was assigned to unqualified employees.

summary: Employees pressured to work off the clock before shift start.
rewritten_summary: Management instructed clerks to begin work-related tasks before their official clock-in time, without compensation. This practice was not voluntary.

violations.violation_reason: Employees were required to perform duties off the clock, which is prohibited.
Failure to compensate employees for all hours worked violates federal labor law.
